configurations.name: Precise Technical Analysis
configurations.command: python main.py --query "Analyze the system's core architectural components" --temperature 0.1 --n_predict 2048 --repeat-penalty 1.1 --top-p 0.95 --top-k 40
configurations.description: Testing precise, factual responses with default parameters

configurations.name: Balanced Technical Analysis
configurations.command: python main.py --query "Analyze the system's architecture focusing on maintainability" --temperature 0.2 --n_predict 2048 --repeat-penalty 1.2 --top-p 0.92 --top-k 50

configurations.name: Creative Technical Solutions
configurations.command: python main.py --query "Suggest improvements for the system architecture" --temperature 0.3 --n_predict 2048 --repeat-penalty 1.3 --top-p 0.85 --top-k 60
configurations.description: Testing more creative responses while maintaining coherence

configurations.name: Implementation Details Low Temperature
configurations.command: python main.py --query "Explain the file processing implementation" --temperature 0.1 --n_predict 2048 --repeat-penalty 1.15 --top-p 0.97 --top-k 30

configurations.name: Implementation Details Medium Temperature
configurations.command: python main.py --query "Review the document loading system" --temperature 0.25 --n_predict 2048 --repeat-penalty 1.25 --top-p 0.9 --top-k 45

configurations.name: Performance Analysis Precise
configurations.description: Testing analytical precision with longer context

configurations.name: Performance Analysis Creative
configurations.description: Testing creative problem-solving with longer context

configurations.name: Integration Requirements Low Temp
configurations.command: python main.py --query "List core requirements for PDF integration" --temperature 0.1 --n_predict 2048 --repeat-penalty 1.3 --top-p 0.95 --top-k 40
